title: Ep95: Royal Naval Division on the Ancre, 1916
itunes:title: Ep95: Royal Naval Division on the Ancre, 1916
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary tell the story of the Royal Naval Division and the Battle of the Ancre in the closing stages of the Battle of the Somme, November 1916. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great...
description:
Pete and Gary tell the story of the Royal Naval Division and the Battle of the Ancre in the closing stages of the Battle of the Somme, November 1916.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
